description:
Definitely the guy next door, Chris is a 20 year old college sophomore studying history, who actually lives two doors down from one of our model scouts.
He says that he likes going to school, but the part he's enjoying most right now is the weekends, where he says he's 'an animal' and seeks out any chance to get drunk and hook up with girls. That's actually how he met our scout, by popping into a party she was throwing, and they hadn't even met yet. He seems laid back, but he proves that looks can be deceiving. Well, he's certainly not shy when it comes to the 'animal' in his pants either... and as you'll see, he likes getting off just as much as the next guy.
Watch Chris as he kicks back, relaxes, and strokes himself into pure private ecstasy.
title: Chris
